fi.left2die.model
Class PadConfig

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.model.PadConfig

public class PadConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds a game controller configurations. Classes properties are public for performance issues, each one of the properties are accessed more than 60 time in seconds. The accessing times totally depends on current FPS.

Author:
TeeMuki

Field Summary
 float deadZone
          Game controller input values that are smoler than deadzone are not used any way.
